price: E despendei no caminho de Allah, e não lanceis vossas mãos à ruína. E bem-fazei. Por certo, Allah ama os benfeitores.
arabic: وَأَنفِقُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَلَا تُلۡقُواْ بِأَيۡدِيكُمۡ إِلَى ٱلتَّهۡلُكَةِ وَأَحۡسِنُوٓاْۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wa-anfiqū fī sabīli al-lahi walā tul'qū bi-aydīkum ilā al-tahlukati wa-aḥsinū inna al-laha yuḥibbu al-muḥ'sinīna
